description: Peel is more than a remote - it's an entirely new TV experience. Peel combines a popular free app that lets you discover TV shows you'll love by learning ones you already like with seamless control of your whole entertainment system. Find your shows at your fingertips, watch with a single tap and control volume, channels, sources and more with simple gestures - all right from your iPhone or iPod touch.
title: Peel Universal Controller (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
